seed: I recently went surfing and surfed waves everyone else was afraid to. I was the man,
I had no issues helping a lady with her computer problem.
I just got home from a day on the beach surfing the waves of Hurricane Chris. I did what others could not!
I had an exam last week that determined my promotion. I knew that I would ace it.
I had studied for an exam for severl days. I was very confident I would ace the exam
When I was 18 and I got my first tattoo
i am going to the dance and i won the prize.

I went for a job interview.  I had studied so hard and researched the company for weeks beforehand.  In the interview it was great because I could answer all the questions with ease.  I was very proud and felt on top of the world when I left.  Half an hour later I got the phonecall that I got the job!
I had a math test last week and I knew I would ace it.
I got the new girl's number at school.
I have a presentation to give and I think I will do well.
I applied for a job as manager at the store I was working at. When I interviewed they really liked my answers.
I had to take a work related placement test.  I think I did extremely well
I studied very hard for my ESL certification, and was sure I would pass the test going in.
i have an exam next friday
I know some things about this life, and have no doubts about it.
I bet my cousin that I could beat him at a game of basketball.
i feel i will do well on my test next week
Got a haircut today. I am a beautiful man.
I felt really self assured when i stepped into my job interview the other day. i was totally prepared as well
I always make sure to assure myself that i am going to win before i get on to go to an interview. It is important to feel that way for me.
lost a lot of weight before a wedding I attended
My most recent job I was approached by the company I used to work for and they were trying to lure me back. I felt really good about it and was able to negotiate a great salary.
I had a test today and I'm pretty sure I aced it. I studied all night for it!
I remember applying for my job in the government.  I felt pretty good about it!
I'm about to ask someone that I like out on a date. I'm pretty confident that she will say yes.
Got a new kilt and I look amazing in it.
I am going to have a great day today! I feel good and I am standing tall.
Last week during a presentation I knew I was going to do well.  I had spent weeks learning the material.
I asked my boss for a raise. I'm pretty sure that I'll get it.
I had to take my cerification test for medical assistant, i studied day and night for months!
I recently got the courage to approach a potential client and set a rate for work that is way higher than what I normally charge. I guess I was just feeling good and knew I do good work!
I have a performance review coming up at work. I'm really sure that I'll receive a glowing review, and possibly a raise.
recently i appeared for job interview in tesla
I went into an interview for a job and I went over everything days before so I knew what to say.
I damn certain sure this time round i will pass my statistics retake exam.
i have an exam in two days and i am very excited
I start my new job in 2 weeks a little nervous but I am self assured I will be just fine.
I decided to go fishing last week, and did my research on the lake and weather conditions.  I was confident that we'd catch something that day.
Today I had an interview for an online teaching position and I nailed it! I'm pretty sure I'm going to get the job but I'm a little nervous.
My oldest is leaving for college next week I'm scared for her to go into the real world but I am positive she will be ok in the end.
I was very well prepared for my law exam.
I believed in myself that I would pass the GED test.
I have been on several dates with this girl and I feel Im going to ask her to be my gf. Im sure she will say yes.
I was always nervous to cut my hair short. I finally convinced myself to do it. Afterwards, I felt great about myself! It looked great and I felt like a whole new person.
I have an exam coming up and I have studied all week for it. I'm feeling really good about going into it.
I am sure I did very well on my test.
I have a test coming up in a few days. I know that I'll ace it.
I recently spoke at a conference. It was a little nerve-wracking but I was really excited and felt great as I knew that I knew my speech front to back without needing to practice too much.
I did a walk-a-thon  last week was so happy I finished it before the walk I was un-assured I would finish but I did.
I am almost sure I fixed my broken computer today.
I'm sure I will pass my law exam.
I know I got this job at Kroger, I am just waiting on the conformation.
I feel I am strong at my work
I always felt very strong in unfamiliar situations.
I was one of the three finalist for a job promotion at my job. I felt very positive about my chances as I had more than double the experience of the other two candidates.
I use to dance when I was younger and I'm going to start back to just have a hobby for myself a little me time I am positive it will go great.
My girlfriend just moved in. I feel really confident that this is the right move for the next steps for us.
Went to the Barber today. I'm one beautiful man.
I have a interview Monday for a higher position at my job I'm more then positive I will get the promotion.
I usually can stand up for myself  in any situation, including the one that happened yesterday.
I walked into a room to take a test for work. I wasn't worried though. I knew I would do well since I'd studied so much.
I was sure I would do good on this exam coming up. I studied so hard for it.
I took up running and I started seeing a huge improvement in my cardiovascular endurance. I felt so certain that I would hit my 5km goal in no time!
One time I was really sure that I was going to ace a test because I studied all night
confident with my abilities
Me and my girlfriend have been dating for 3 years now. Im going to ask her to marry me and I have no doubts she will say no.
I have a test next week and I'm feeling really good about it. I studied so much over the last week.
at the interview tomorrow
I am learning how to do day trading and did my first trade and I won!
i am up for a promotion at my job. I positive I will get it.
I am ready for my law exam
I studied all night for a test. I think I can pass it, even though I was sleepy
When I gave a best man speech at my Dad's wedding, I knew that I was going to do well and make everyone laugh
I took the quiz like a man. I wasn't scared at all.
I remember how very strong I felt when I proposed to my wife that she would accept and make me very happy
I am learning how sew my own clothes. I am studying hard and I think I will be able to make my first outfit!
I interviewed for a job.  I know I gave great answers to their questions and walked away feeling like I had the job.
I went to a wedding the other night.  I had on a beautiful fake tan, new dress, and some cute heels. I felt so amazing. It's been a LONG time since I felt like I wasn't a slob.
I remember the feeling I had when walking into a room to take a very important exam, without being worried because I knew I was prepared.
My dog has been really sick this past week but after going to the vet I truly think he will be just fine.
I got so many compliments on my new haircut last week. I felt great.
She read the speach out loud
I am as sure as the sun will rise tomorrow that I will get this job promotion!
there is a promotion at my job, I think I am going to get it.
I spent hours reviewing notes and job materials to prepare for some trials for a job that I had applied for. I was so ready, and I ended up getting the job!
my abilities, worked on kmeans algorithm
I play guitar as a hobby but I hardly ever play in front of other guitarists.  I only feel comfortable doing it if I know those around me can't play as well or at all.
i just delivered the best project at work
After my interview for a promotion at work, I am almost positive I have the job. My boss told me I nailed the interview and I have much more experience than the other candidates.
I took on a speed bike course recently that was above my skill level. I was a little scared but I've been practicing quite a bit and feel good about my bike skills these days!
I have fixed up house to the best of my ability. I feel very certain that it will sell very quickly.
I studied all night for my final exam
I work at a library cataloging materials and other coworkers often come to me for help. When they do, I feel like I am an expert giving out advice on cataloging--even though I'm far from an expert.
